content:
You are a prompt enhancement assistant for Contextune, a Claude Code plugin.

USER'S PROMPT: "can you add the following example plots to the gallery and make them use prs:dataviz\
\

# @title data plotting  {display-mode: "form"}

axes_font_color=dark_blue
axes_font_size=50
axes_font_weight='bold'
line_width=5

# Plot
ax = df_pivot.plot(kind='barh', stacked=True, color=[color_mapping[col] for col in df_pivot.columns], figsize=(40, 20), width=0.8)  # Double the width of the bars

# Despine the plot and remove x and y lines
sns.despine(left=True)  # Removes the top, right, bottom, and left spines (borders) from the plot

# Set font size

right_labale_color='white'
# Customize the x-axis line
ax.spines['bottom'].set_linewidth(line_width)
ax.spines['bottom'].set_color(axes_font_color)

# Annotate the bars with the name and percentage
for i, (colname, col) in enumerate(df_pivot.items()):
    df_col=(pd.DataFrame(col).reset_index())
    for j, val in enumerate(col):
        barrier=df_col.loc[j,"Demographic/Barrier"]
        # print(f"{j} ({val:.1f}) {barrier}")
        text_new_line=f'{colname}\n{val:.1f}'
        if not pd.isna(val):
            font = 50
            color = 'white'
            xpos = 20
            text=text_new_line#f'{colname}: {val:.1f}% '

            if colname in ["Syndromic", "White", "Male"]:
                color = right_labale_color
                xpos = 80
                text=text_new_line
            if (barrier in ["Prenatal Diagnosis","Migrant Status"]) & (colname=="Yes") :
                color = right_labale_color
                xpos = 96
                text=text_new_line
            elif (barrier in ["Adoption Status"]) & (colname=="Yes") :
                color = right_labale_color
                xpos = 92
                text=text_new_line
            elif (barrier =="English Proficiency") & (colname=="Yes"):
                color = right_labale_color
                xpos = 98.2
                text=text_new_line
                font=font-15


            ax.text(xpos, j, text, va='center', ha='center', color=color, fontsize=font, fontweight='bold')

# Hide the legend
ax.legend().set_visible(False)  # Sets the visibility of the legend

# Increase y-tick label font size and make y-tick labels bold
ax.tick_params(axis='y', labelsize=axes_font_size, labelcolor=axes_font_color)  # axis='y': axis to apply parameters ('x', 'y', 'both')
# labelsize=font: size of tick labels

# Make y-tick labels bold
for label in ax.get_yticklabels():
    label.set_fontweight('bold')

# Increase x-tick label font size
ax.tick_params(axis='x', labelsize=axes_font_size, labelcolor=axes_font_color)  # axis='x': axis to apply parameters ('x', 'y', 'both')
# labelsize=font: size of tick labels
# Format x-tick labels as percentages
ax.xaxis.set_major_formatter(FuncFormatter(lambda x, _: f'{x:.0f}%'))

# Set x-ticks to 0% and 100%
ax.set_xticks([0,50, 100])
# Show tick marks for x-axis
ax.tick_params(axis='x', which='both', bottom=True, top=False,length=10, width=line_width)

# Set the limits for the x-axis
ax.set_xlim(0, 100)
# Remove grid
plt.grid(False)  # Removes the grid from the plot

plt.xlabel('Percentage of Patients', fontsize=axes_font_size, fontweight='bold', color=axes_font_color)
plt.ylabel(' ', fontsize=font, fontweight='bold', color=axes_font_color)

plt.tight_layout()  # Adjusts the plot to ensure everything fits without overlapping

# Display the plot
plt.show()  # Renders and displays the plot
\
\
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd
import textwrap

# Adopted Data
categories = ['30 Day Complications', 'Complications Before Discharge', 'Growth Delay', 'Revision Performed', 'Speech Therapy', 'Velopharyngeal Insufficiency']
non_syndromic_adopted = [0, 3.12, 6.25, 31.25, 78.12, 15.62]
syndromic_adopted = [0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0]

# Wrap x-tick labels
wrapped_categories_adopted = [textwrap.fill(label, 15) for label in categories]

# Create a DataFrame
data_adopted = pd.DataFrame({
    'Category': wrapped_categories_adopted * 2,
    'Count': non_syndromic_adopted + syndromic_adopted,
    'Type': ['Non-syndromic'] * len(categories) + ['Syndromic'] * len(categories)
})

# Not Adopted Data
non_syndromic_not_adopted = [2, 3, 5, 1, 25, 8]
syndromic_not_adopted = [3, 4, 20, 2, 30, 12]

# Wrap x-tick labels
wrapped_categories_not_adopted = [textwrap.fill(label, 15) for label in categories]

# Create a DataFrame
data_not_adopted = pd.DataFrame({
    'Category': wrapped_categories_not_adopted * 2,
    'Count': non_syndromic_not_adopted + syndromic_not_adopted,
    'Type': ['Non-syndromic'] * len(categories) + ['Syndromic'] * len(categories)
})

# Custom colors and font sizes ['#003366', '#ff7f0e']
dark_red = "#d62728"
dark_blue = "#003366"
label_fontsize = 20
tick_fontsize = 16
font_color = dark_blue
annotation_fontsize = 14
annotation_fontweight = 'bold'
annotation_fontcolor = dark_blue

# Set the style for the plot
sns.set(style="whitegrid")

# Create the subplots
fig, axes = plt.subplots(2, 1, figsize=(14, 10))

# Plot for adopted data
sns.set_context("notebook", font_scale=1.5)
adopted_barplot = sns.barplot(ax=axes[0], data=data_adopted, x='Category', y='Count', hue='Type', alpha=1, palette={'Non-syndromic': dark_blue, 'Syndromic': dark_red})
axes[0].set_xlabel('')
axes[0].set_ylabel('Adopted\nNumber of Patients',fontsize=label_fontsize, fontweight='bold', color=font_color)
axes[0].tick_params(axis='x', rotation=0, labelsize=tick_fontsize, colors='white')
axes[0].tick_params(axis='y', labelsize=label_fontsize, colors=font_color)
axes[0].legend(title='', fontsize=label_fontsize, frameon=False, loc='upper center', bbox_to_anchor=(0.3, 1.15), ncol=2, markerscale=4, labelspacing=0.25, handleheight=2, handlelength=2, columnspacing=0.75)
sns.despine(ax=axes[0])
axes[0].grid(False)
for label in axes[0].get_xticklabels():
    label.set_fontweight('bold')
for label in axes[0].get_yticklabels():
    label.set_fontweight('bold')

# Add annotations
for p in adopted_barplot.patches:
    if p.get_height() != 0:
      adopted_barplot.annotate(format(p.get_height(), '.0f'),
                              (p.get_x() + p.get_width() / 2., p.get_height()),
                              ha = 'center', va = 'center',
                              xytext = (0, 9), textcoords = 'offset points',
                               fontsize=annotation_fontsize, fontweight=annotation_fontweight, color=annotation_fontcolor)

# Plot for not adopted data
barplot = sns.barplot(ax=axes[1], data=data_not_adopted, x='Category', y='Count', hue='Type', alpha=1, palette={'Non-syndromic': dark_blue, 'Syndromic': dark_red})
axes[1].set_xlabel('')
axes[1].set_ylabel('Not Adopted\nNumber of Patients',fontsize=label_fontsize, fontweight='bold', color=font_color)
axes[1].tick_params(axis='x', rotation=0, labelsize=tick_fontsize, colors=font_color)
axes[1].tick_params(axis='y', labelsize=label_fontsize, colors=font_color)
axes[1].legend().set_visible(False) #(title='', fontsize=label_fontsize, frameon=False, loc='upper center', bbox_to_anchor=(0.5, 1.15), ncol=2, markerscale=4, labelspacing=0.25, handleheight=2, handlelength=2, columnspacing=0.75)
sns.despine(ax=axes[1])
axes[1].grid(False)
for label in axes[1].get_xticklabels():
    label.set_fontweight('bold')
for label in axes[1].get_yticklabels():
    label.set_fontweight('bold')

# Add annotations
for p in barplot.patches:
    if p.get_height() != 0:
      barplot.annotate(format(p.get_height(), '.0f'),
                      (p.get_x() + p.get_width() / 2., p.get_height()),
                      ha = 'center', va = 'center',
                      xytext = (0, 9), textcoords = 'offset points',
                       fontsize=annotation_fontsize, fontweight=annotation_fontweight, color=annotation_fontcolor)

# Set the facecolor to transparent
fig.patch.set_facecolor('none')
fig.patch.set_alpha(0.0)

# Adjust layout
plt.tight_layout()
plt.subplots_adjust(hspace=0.1)  # Adjust the space between subplots
plt.show()
\
\

dark_red = "#d62728"
dark_blue = "#003366"
label_fontsize = 30
tick_fontsize = 16
font_color = dark_blue
annotation_fontsize = 14
annotation_fontweight = 'bold'
annotation_fontcolor = dark_blue
# Set the desired order of categories
category_order = ['Growth Delay', 'Speech Therapy', 'Prenatal Diagnosis', 'Adopted']
group_order = ['Non-syndromic: No', 'Non-syndromic: Yes', 'Syndromic: No', 'Syndromic: Yes']

# Set color palette
color_palette = ["#d62728", "#003366", "#ff7f0e", "#8c564b"]

# Pivot the DataFrame to make it suitable for stacked bar plot
df_pivot = df.pivot(index='Category', columns='Group', values='Value').reindex(category_order)

# Create the plot using matplotlib

ax = df_pivot.plot(kind='barh', stacked=True, color=color_palette, edgecolor='none',figsize=(30, 20), width=0.8)

# Customize the plot
ax.set_xlabel('')
ax.set_ylabel('')
ax.tick_params(axis='both', which='major', labelsize=label_fontsize, colors=font_color)
ax.tick_params(axis='both', which='minor', labelsize=label_fontsize, colors=font_color)
for label in ax.get_xticklabels():
    label.set_fontweight('bold')
for label in ax.get_yticklabels():
    label.set_fontweight('bold')
ax.legend(title='', fontsize=label_fontsize, frameon=False, loc='upper center', bbox_to_anchor=(0.3, 1.15), ncol=2, markerscale=4, labelspacing=0.25, handleheight=2, handlelength=2, columnspacing=0.75)

sns.despine(left=True, bottom=True)

# Add value labels to the bars
for container in ax.containers:
    ax.bar_label(container, labels=[f'{val:.0f}' if val != 0 else '' for val in container.datavalues],
                 label_type='center', color='white', fontsize=label_fontsize, fontweight='bold')

# Adjust the layout
plt.tight_layout()

# Display the plot
plt.show()
"

DETECTED COMMAND: /ctx:configure
DETECTION CONFIDENCE: 100%

AVAILABLE ALTERNATIVES:
- /ctx:design
- /ctx:research
- /ctx:plan
- /ctx:execute
- /ctx:status
- /ctx:cleanup
- /ctx:help
- /ctx:configure
- /ctx:stats
- /ctx:verify

TASK: Analyze the user's prompt and provide:
1. Whether the detected command is the best match (true/false)
2. Alternative commands if better matches exist
3. A brief, helpful suggestion for the user

RESPONSE FORMAT (JSON):
{
  "is_best_match": true/false,
  "alternatives": ["command1", "command2"],
  "suggestion": "Brief suggestion text"
}

Be concise. Focus on actionability.

import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd
import textwrap

categories = ['30 Day Complications', 'Complications Before Discharge', 'Growth Delay', 'Revision Performed', 'Speech Therapy', 'Velopharyngeal Insufficiency']

syndromic_adopted = [0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0]

    'Category': wrapped_categories_adopted * 2,
    'Count': non_syndromic_adopted + syndromic_adopted,
    'Type': ['Non-syndromic'] * len(categories) + ['Syndromic'] * len(categories)

syndromic_not_adopted = [3, 4, 20, 2, 30, 12]

})

# Custom colors and font sizes ['#003366', '#ff7f0e']

dark_blue = "#003366"
label_fontsize = 20
tick_fontsize = 16
font_color = dark_blue
annotation_fontsize = 14
annotation_fontweight = 'bold'
annotation_fontcolor = dark_blue

# Set the style for the plot
sns.set(style="whitegrid")

# Create the subplots

# Plot for adopted data
sns.set_context("notebook", font_scale=1.5)
adopted_barplot = sns.barplot(ax=axes[0], data=data_adopted, x='Category', y='Count', hue='Type', alpha=1, palette={'Non-syndromic': dark_blue, 'Syndromic': dark_red})
axes[0].set_xlabel('')
axes[0].set_ylabel('Adopted\nNumber of Patients',fontsize=label_fontsize, fontweight='bold', color=font_color)
axes[0].tick_params(axis='x', rotation=0, labelsize=tick_fontsize, colors='white')

    if p.get_height() != 0:

                              (p.get_x() + p.get_width() / 2., p.get_height()),
                              ha = 'center', va = 'center',
                              xytext = (0, 9), textcoords = 'offset points',
                               fontsize=annotation_fontsize, fontweight=annotation_fontweight, color=annotation_fontcolor)

                      ha = 'center', va = 'center',
                      xytext = (0, 9), textcoords = 'offset points',
                       fontsize=annotation_fontsize, fontweight=annotation_fontweight, color=annotation_fontcolor)

# Set the facecolor to transparent

group_order = ['Non-syndromic: No', 'Non-syndromic: Yes', 'Syndromic: No', 'Syndromic: Yes']

ax = df_pivot.plot(kind='barh', stacked=True, color=color_palette, edgecolor='none',figsize=(30, 20), width=0.8)

# Customize the plot

ax.set_ylabel('')

ax.tick_params(axis='both', which='minor', labelsize=label_fontsize, colors=font_color)
for label in ax.get_xticklabels():
    label.set_fontweight('bold')
for label in ax.get_yticklabels():
    label.set_fontweight('bold')
ax.legend(title='', fontsize=label_fontsize, frameon=False, loc='upper center', bbox_to_anchor=(0.3, 1.15), ncol=2, markerscale=4, labelspacing=0.25, handleheight=2, handlelength=2, columnspacing=0.75)

sns.despine(left=True, bottom=True)

# Add value labels to the bars
for container in ax.containers:
    ax.bar_label(container, labels=[f'{val:.0f}' if val != 0 else '' for val in container.datavalues],
                 label_type='center', color='white', fontsize=label_fontsize, fontweight='bold')

content.text:
```json
{
  "is_best_match": false,
  "alternatives": ["/ctx:implement", "/ctx:plan"],
  "suggestion": "Use /ctx:implement to add these example plots to the gallery and integrate prs-dataviz. This is a concrete implementation task, not configuration. If you want to plan the approach first, use /ctx:plan."
}
```
